items.title: Star glamour on the Golden Globes red carpet
items.description: The Golden Globes, one of Hollywood's leading awards ceremonies, is taking place in Los Angeles.

items.title: Iran warns it will retaliate if US attacks, as hundreds killed in protests
items.description: President Trump said on Sunday that the US military was considering "very strong options" in Iran.

items.title: US justice department opens criminal probe into Fed chair Jerome Powell
items.description: Powell called the probe "unprecedented" and came after his refusal to lower interest rates after demands by Donald Trump.

items.title: Golden Globes host Nikki Glaser's best jokes
items.description: The US comic delivered a scorching opening monologue that roasted the A-listers in the room.

items.title: Parents of under-fives to be offered screen time guidance
items.description: Children who spend the most time on devices or in front of screens find conversation and learning harder, the government says.
